actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the annual report of the Secretary of Transportation entitled "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program" as a Senate document. Directs that a specified number of additional copies be printed for the use of the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program" as a Senate document.
